name: Triviality (AnKK)
description:
Creator: Crystal & An

We make this game to reveal our fear as women in everyday life. Both Crystal and I are Chinese so problems revealed in this game are based more on Chinese content. Don’t get me wrong. None of us is living in the shadow of any men nor any political groups. I am happy every day as a woman but also fear every day about the things that might happen to me. This game is about this fear.
